verses.verse: "Give <WH238> ear, <WH238> O heavens, <WH8064> and let me speak; <WH1696> And let the earth <WH776> hear <WH8085> the words <WH561> of my mouth. <WH6310>

"Let my teaching <WH3948> drop <WH6201> as the rain, <WH4306> My speech <WH565> distill <WH5140> as the dew, <WH2919> As the droplets <WH8164> on the fresh <WH1877> grass <WH1877> And as the showers <WH7241> on the herb. <WH6212>
"For I proclaim <WH7121> the name <WH8034> of the Lord; <WH3068> Ascribe <WH3051> greatness <WH1433> to our God! <WH430>

"The Rock! <WH6697> His work <WH6467> is perfect, <WH8549> For all <WH3605> His ways <WH1870> are just; <WH4941> A God <WH410> of faithfulness <WH530> and without <WH369> injustice, <WH5766> Righteous <WH6662> and upright <WH3477> is He.
"They have acted <WH7843> corruptly <WH7843> toward Him, [They are] not His children, <WH1121> because of their defect; <WH9249> [But are] a perverse <WH6141> and crooked <WH6618> generation.

"Do you thus <WH2088> repay <WH1580> the Lord, <WH3068> O foolish <WH5036> and unwise <WH3808> <WH2450> people <WH5971>? Is not He your Father who has bought <WH1> you? He has made <WH7069> you and established <WH6213> you.

"Remember <WH2142> the days <WH3117> of old, <WH5769> Consider <WH995> the years <WH8141> of all <WH1755> generations. <WH1755> Ask <WH7592> your father, and he will inform <WH1> you, Your elders, <WH5046> and they will tell <WH2205> you.

"When the Most <WH9411> High <WH9411> gave <WH5157> the nations <WH1471> their inheritance, <WH5157> When He separated <WH6504> the sons <WH1121> of man, <WH120> He set <WH5324> the boundaries <WH1367> of the peoples <WH5971> According to the number <WH4557> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>
"For the Lord's portion <WH2506> is His people; <WH5971> Jacob <WH3290> is the allotment <WH9112> of His inheritance. <WH5159>

"He found <WH4672> him in a desert <WH4057> land, <WH776> And in the howling <WH3214> waste <WH8414> of a wilderness; <WH3452> He encircled <WH5437> him, He cared <WH995> for him, He guarded <WH5431> him as the pupil <WH380> of His eye. <WH5869>

"Like an eagle <WH5404> that stirs <WH5782> up its nest, <WH7064> That hovers <WH9550> over <WH5921> its young, <WH1469> He spread <WH6566> His wings <WH3671> and caught <WH3947> them, He carried <WH5375> them on His pinions. <WH84>
"The Lord <WH3068> alone <WH910> guided <WH5148> him, And there <WH369> was no <WH369> foreign <WH5236> god <WH410> with him.

"He made him ride <WH7392> on the high <WH1116> places <WH1116> of the earth, <WH776> And he ate <WH398> the produce <WH8570> of the field; <WH9583> And He made him suck <WH3243> honey <WH1706> from the rock, <WH5553> And oil <WH8081> from the flinty <WH2496> rock, <WH6697>

Curds <WH2529> of cows, <WH1241> and milk <WH2461> of the flock, <WH6629> With fat <WH2459> of lambs, <WH3733> And rams, <WH352> the breed <WH1121> of Bashan, <WH1316> and goats, <WH6260> With the finest <WH2459> <WH3629> of the wheat <WH2406> – And of the blood <WH1818> of grapes <WH6025> you drank <WH8354> wine. <WH2561>

"But Jeshurun <WH3484> grew <WH8080> fat <WH8080> and kicked <WH1163> – You are grown <WH8080> fat, <WH8080> thick, <WH5666> and sleek <WH3780> – Then he forsook <WH5203> God <WH433> who made <WH6213> him, And scorned <WH9310> the Rock <WH6697> of his salvation. <WH3444>
"They made <WH7065> Him jealous <WH7065> with strange <WH2114> [gods;] With abominations <WH8441> they provoked <WH3707> Him to anger. <WH3707>

"They sacrificed <WH2076> to demons <WH7700> who were not God, <WH433> To gods <WH430> whom they have not known, <WH3045> New <WH2319> [gods] who came <WH935> lately, <WH7138> Whom your fathers did not dread. <WH1>
"You neglected <WH7876> the Rock <WH6697> who begot <WH3205> you, And forgot <WH7911> the God <WH410> who gave <WH9123> you birth. <WH9123>
"And the Lord <WH3068> saw <WH7200> [this,] and spurned <WH5006> [them] Because <WH4480> of the provocation <WH3708> of His sons <WH1121> and daughters. <WH1323>

"Then He said, <WH559> 'I will hide <WH5641> My face <WH6440> from them, I will see <WH7200> what <WH4100> their end <WH319> [shall be;] For they are a perverse <WH8419> generation, Sons <WH1121> in whom is no <WH3808> faithfulness. <WH529>

'They have made <WH7065> Me jealous <WH7065> with [what] is not God; <WH410> They have provoked <WH3707> Me to anger <WH3707> with their idols. <WH1892> So I will make them jealous <WH7065> with [those who] are not a people; <WH5971> I will provoke <WH3707> them to anger <WH3707> with a foolish <WH5036> nation, <WH1471>

For a fire <WH784> is kindled <WH6919> in My anger, <WH639> And burns <WH3344> to the lowest <WH8482> part <WH8482> of Sheol, <WH7585> And consumes <WH398> the earth <WH776> with its yield, <WH2981> And sets <WH3857> on fire <WH3857> the foundations <WH4144> of the mountains. <WH2022>
'I will heap <WH5595> misfortunes <WH9567> on them; I will use <WH3615> My arrows <WH2671> on them.

'[They shall be] wasted <WH4198> by famine, <WH7458> and consumed <WH9237> by plague <WH7565> And bitter <WH4815> destruction; <WH6986> And the teeth <WH8127> of beasts <WH929> I will send <WH7971> upon them, With the venom <WH2534> of crawling <WH9102> things <WH9102> of the dust. <WH6083>

'Outside <WH4480> <WH2351> the sword <WH2719> shall bereave, <WH7921> And inside <WH4480> <WH2315> terror <WH367> – Both <WH1571> young <WH970> man <WH970> and virgin, <WH1330> The nursling <WH3243> with the man <WH376> of gray <WH7872> hair. <WH7872>
'I would have said, <WH559> "I will cut <WH6284> them to pieces, <WH6284> I will remove <WH7673> the memory <WH2143> of them from men, <WH582>"

Had I not feared <WH9076> the provocation <WH3708> by the enemy, <WH340> Lest <WH6435> their adversaries <WH6862> should misjudge, <WH9330> Lest <WH6435> they should say, <WH559> "Our hand <WH3027> is triumphant, <WH7311> And the Lord <WH3068> has not done <WH6466> all <WH3605> this. <WH2088>"'
"For they are a nation <WH1471> lacking in counsel, <WH6> And there <WH6098> is no <WH369> understanding <WH369> in them.
"Would <WH3863> that they were wise, <WH2449> that they understood <WH7919> this, <WH2088> That they would discern <WH995> their future! <WH319>

"How <WH351> could one <WH259> chase <WH7291> a thousand, <WH505> And two <WH8147> put <WH5127> ten <WH7233> thousand <WH7233> to flight, <WH5127> Unless <WH518> <WH3808> <WH3588> their Rock <WH6697> had sold <WH4376> them, And the Lord <WH3068> had given <WH5462> them up?
"Indeed <WH3588> their rock <WH6697> is not like our Rock, <WH6697> Even our enemies <WH340> themselves judge <WH6414> this.

"For their vine <WH1612> is from the vine <WH1612> of Sodom, <WH5467> And from the fields <WH7709> of Gomorrah; <WH6017> Their grapes <WH6025> are grapes <WH6025> of poison, <WH7219> Their clusters, <WH811> bitter. <WH4846>
"Their wine <WH3196> is the venom <WH2534> of serpents, <WH8577> And the deadly <WH393> poison <WH7219> of cobras. <WH6620>
'Is it not laid <WH3647> up in store <WH3647> with Me, Sealed <WH2856> up in My treasuries <WH214>?

'Vengeance <WH5359> is Mine, and retribution, <WH8005> In due time <WH6256> their foot <WH7272> will slip; <WH4131> For the day <WH3117> of their calamity <WH343> is near, <WH7138> And the impending <WH6264> things <WH6264> are hastening <WH2363> upon them.'

"For the Lord <WH3068> will vindicate <WH1777> His people, <WH5971> And will have <WH5162> compassion <WH5162> on His servants; <WH5650> When <WH3588> He sees <WH7200> that [their] strength <WH3027> is gone, <WH235> And there <WH657> is none <WH657> [remaining,] bond <WH6113> or free. <WH5800>
"And He will say, <WH559> 'Where <WH335> are their gods, <WH430> The rock <WH6697> in which they sought <WH2620> refuge <WH2620>?

'Who <WH834> ate <WH398> the fat <WH2459> of their sacrifices, <WH2077> [And] drank <WH8354> the wine <WH3196> of their libation <WH9331>? Let them rise <WH6965> up and help <WH5826> you, Let them be your hiding <WH9377> place! <WH9377>

'See <WH7200> now <WH6258> that I, I am He, And there <WH369> is no <WH369> god <WH430> besides <WH5973> Me; It is I who put <WH4191> to death <WH4191> and give <WH2421> life. <WH2421> I have wounded, <WH4272> and it is I who heal; <WH7495> And there <WH369> is no <WH369> one <WH369> who can deliver <WH5337> from My hand. <WH3027>
'Indeed, <WH3588> I lift <WH5375> up My hand <WH3027> to heaven, <WH8064> And say, <WH559> as I live <WH2416> forever, <WH5769>

If <WH518> I sharpen <WH8150> My flashing <WH1300> sword, <WH2719> And My hand <WH3027> takes <WH270> hold <WH270> on justice, <WH4941> I will render <WH7725> vengeance <WH5359> on My adversaries, <WH6862> And I will repay <WH9608> those who hate <WH8130> Me.

'I will make My arrows <WH2671> drunk <WH7937> with blood, <WH1818> And My sword <WH2719> shall devour <WH398> flesh, <WH1320> With the blood <WH1818> of the slain <WH2491> and the captives, <WH7633> From the long-haired leaders <WH7218> of the enemy. <WH340>'

"Rejoice, <WH7442> O nations, <WH1471> [with] His people; <WH5971> For He will avenge <WH5358> the blood <WH1818> of His servants, <WH5650> And will render <WH7725> vengeance <WH5359> on His adversaries, <WH6862> And will atone <WH3722> for His land <WH127> [and] His people. <WH5971>"

Then Moses <WH4872> came <WH935> and spoke <WH1696> all <WH3605> the words <WH1697> of this <WH2088> song <WH9598> in the hearing <WH241> of the people, <WH5971> he, with Joshua <WH1954> the son <WH1121> of Nun. <WH5126>
When Moses <WH4872> had finished <WH3615> speaking <WH1696> all <WH3605> these <WH428> words <WH1697> to all <WH3605> Israel, <WH3478>

he said <WH559> to them, "Take <WH7760> to your heart <WH3824> all <WH3605> the words <WH1697> with which <WH834> I am warning <WH5749> you today, <WH3117> which <WH834> you shall command <WH6680> your sons <WH1121> to observe <WH6213> carefully, <WH6213> [even] all <WH3605> the words <WH1697> of this <WH2088> law. <WH8451>

"For it is not an idle <WH7386> word <WH1697> for you; indeed <WH3588> it is your life. <WH9132> And by this <WH2088> word <WH1697> you shall prolong <WH748> your days <WH3117> in the land, <WH127> which <WH834> you are about to cross <WH5674> the Jordan <WH3383> to possess. <WH3423>"
And the Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses <WH4872> that very <WH6106> same <WH6106> day, <WH3117> saying, <WH559>

"Go <WH5927> up to this <WH2088> mountain <WH2022> of the Abarim, <WH5682> Mount <WH2022> Nebo, <WH5015> which <WH834> is in the land <WH776> of Moab <WH4124> opposite <WH5921> <WH6440> Jericho, <WH3405> and look <WH7200> at the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667> which <WH834> I am giving <WH5414> to the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> for a possession. <WH272>

"Then die <WH4191> on the mountain <WH2022> where <WH834> <WH8033> you ascend, <WH5927> and be gathered <WH622> to your people, <WH9415> as Aaron <WH175> your brother <WH251> died <WH4191> on Mount <WH2022> Hor <WH2023> and was gathered <WH622> to his people, <WH9415>

because <WH5921> <WH834> you broke <WH4603> faith <WH4603> with Me in the midst <WH8432> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> at the waters <WH4325> of Meribah-kadesh, in the wilderness <WH4057> of Zin, <WH6790> because <WH5921> <WH834> you did not treat <WH6942> Me as holy <WH6942> in the midst <WH8432> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>

"For you shall see <WH7200> the land <WH776> at a distance, <WH4480> <WH5048> but you shall not go <WH935> there, <WH8033> into the land <WH776> which <WH834> I am giving <WH5414> the sons <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>"
